headline: Palantir And Cognizant Partnership Deepens AI Role In Regulated Industries
summary: Palantir Technologies (NasdaqGS:PLTR) announced a partnership with Cognizant to expand AI driven modernization across healthcare and enterprise operations. The collaboration is focused on deploying Palantir's AI platform into complex, highly regulated sectors using Cognizant's global IT services reach. The agreement is positioned to support digital transformation projects at scale in healthcare and other data intensive industries. For you as an investor, this move highlights how Palantir is...
